Html:
I am having a problem where letters are being cut off in the second line of text in large icon view.

Please see the screenshot. In small image mode, everything is fine. In large, all letters below the base line of text are cut off. In this screenshot, those are j, q, and y for illustration purposes. Specifying Height does not do anything.
Screenshot

I apologize if this is a duplicate issue, but I don't see anyone discussing this problem or any workaround. Please help.
I don't have a workaround at this time, but I did file a bug in our internal database regarding this issue.

Just to clarify, I did not mean that specifying Height does not do anything.  I meant that it does not fix anything.  It does actually push the name of the ribbon group offscreen, while still clipping the 2nd line text, i.e. making things worse.
